response.overview: Darnell, once destined for a professional basketball career, finds himself kicked off his college team and back in his old neighborhood. Hustling streetball games for cash, he gets a chance to restart his career with a junior college tryout in 24 hours. However, his old friend Flip, now a drug dealer, drags him into a series of dangerous incidents. Can Darnell navigate these challenges and make it to the tryout?
response.title: 24 hours
